title: Lok Sabha Election Results: Moody's predict slow fiscal reforms as India returns toward coalition government

title: Good news for Rishi Sunak: UK inflation back to target for 1st time since 2021
description: British inflation returned to its 2% target in May for the first time in nearly three years, official figures showed on Wednesday, as the economic effect of the COVID-19 pandemic and Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine faded. Britain's prime minister Rishi Sunak walks outside 10 Downing Street i...
